Description.Name: Lilly Stewart
Description.Details: Lilly Stewart, known as "Deadlock", is a 36-year-old MechWarrior recognized for her unwavering determination and exceptional close-quarters combat skills. With a steady hand and a fierce resolve, she excels in confined spaces and urban landscapes, and has countless successful drops to her name. Lilly Stewart has already left an indelible mark on the Inner Sphere.
